description: Popular “Silver Oak” by Polygon – Stunning 4-Bedroom End-Unit Townhouse. This bright and spacious townhouse in the prestigious Westwood Plateau is a must-see! Just steps away from middle and elementary schools, IGA grocery, restaurants, and public transportation, it offers both convenience and style. Vaulted ceilings and huge windows create an airy, light-filled living space. Open-concept layout perfect for entertaining and family living. Spacious primary bedroom with vaulted ceiling and two walk-in closets, plus two additional roomy bedrooms upstairs. Lower-level bedroom or office with a full bathroom provides flexibility for work-from-home or guests. Experience the perfect blend of comfort, functionality, and location in this exceptional Westwood Plateau townhouse.
